question: This online site starts Startup C-Cub recently.
explanation: Amazon India collaborated with hardware accelerator "HAX" and crowd-funding community "Kickstarter" to announce "Startup C-Cube" - a multi-level challenge for the startups that will commence in Bengaluru. The winning team in the Startup C-Cube challenge will be supported by Amazon India, HAX and Kickstarter through the entire "concept-to-customer" journey. They will also provide the startup with resources needed to scale up in India, Europe and the US.
